import css from 'styled-jsx/css' import Header from "../Header/Header" import Chat from "../Chat/Chat" import React from 'react' import useRepeat from "../../hooks/useRepeat" import Page from "../Widgets/Page"; export default React.memo(function DefaultLayout({children}) { return
{ children }
}) // language=Stylus const style = css` .default-layout { display flex flex-direction column background-image linear-gradient(#2F3364, #2A2E58) height 100% } .content { overflow hidden display flex flex-direction row height calc(100% - 5em) } `
